title: Serpent of Hell (Cocytus)

|   | A massive white three-headed dragon, covered with shards of gleaming ice, wholly possessed by the nightmarish cold of Cocytus. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

The **Serpent of Hell** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") dragon whose elemental affinity varies based on which branch of [Hell](/Hell "Hell") you encounter it in. When faced in [Cocytus](/Cocytus "Cocytus"), the Serpent is capable of breathing bitter [cold](/Cold "Cold") at you. It is also entirely immune to cold damage itself.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                           |                                                                                                                                                               |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Cold Breath](/Cold_Breath "Cold Breath") (3d34)          | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Noisy flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") (2d27) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Noisy flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Flash Freeze](/Flash_Freeze "Flash Freeze") (3d24)       | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Noisy flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Summon Dragon](/Summon_Dragon "Summon Dragon")           | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags")                                                                                                          |

## Tips & Tricks

- If you brought enough [cold](/Cold "Cold") resistance to endure the other threats in Cocytus, the Serpent of Hell here should pose you little threat. All of its special abilities are largely negated by rC++ or higher, and it isn't especially durable otherwise.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), this Serpent of Hell will have an extra 43 HP.
- In [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), it lost [Ozocubu's Refrigeration](/Ozocubu%27s_Refrigeration "Ozocubu's Refrigeration") in favor of [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") and [Flash Freeze](/Flash_Freeze "Flash Freeze").
- Prior to [0.11](/0.11 "0.11"), this Serpent of Hell had Freezing Cloud instead of [Ozocubu's Refrigeration](/Ozocubu%27s_Refrigeration "Ozocubu's Refrigeration").

Serpent of Hell (Cocytus)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all dragons, see list of dragons.

Serpent of Hell (Cocytus) D 
HP 185-374
HD 17
XP 6066
Speed 14
AC 20
EV 12
Will 180
Attack1 35 (bite: cold)
Attack2 15 (claw: plain)
Attack3 15 (trample: trample)
Resistances rC+++
rPois+
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Demonic
Size Giant
Type dragon, the Serpent of Hell
Flags Destroys doors

See invisible
Flying
Unique
A massive white three-headed dragon, covered with shards of gleaming ice, wholly possessed by the nightmarish cold of Cocytus.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

The Serpent of Hell is a unique dragon whose elemental affinity varies based on which branch of Hell you encounter it in. When faced in Cocytus, the Serpent is capable of breathing bitter cold at you. It is also entirely immune to cold damage itself.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Cold Breath (3d34) Natural flag,
Breath flag,
Noisy flag
Slot2 Freezing Cloud (2d27) Natural flag,
Breath flag,
Noisy flag
Slot3 Flash Freeze (3d24) Natural flag,
Breath flag,
Noisy flag
Slot4 Summon Dragon Magical flag

Tips & Tricks

  • If you brought enough cold resistance to endure the other threats in Cocytus, the Serpent of Hell here should pose you little threat. All of its special abilities are largely negated by rC++ or higher, and it isn't especially durable otherwise.

History

  • In 0.32, this Serpent of Hell will have an extra 43 HP.
  • In 0.16, it lost Ozocubu's Refrigeration in favor of Freezing Cloud and Flash Freeze.
  • Prior to 0.11, this Serpent of Hell had Freezing Cloud instead of Ozocubu's Refrigeration.
